info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:29PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wheeler and south central Gilliam Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 526 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Fossil, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fossil, Mayville and Kinzua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
